//become mentor 1. Develop your teaching skills

3. Be a part of Zio community If you are interested click the button below to mail us your resume and we will contact you back for further process. Passion about learning and teaching
Expertise in any particular field
Thats all it takes Zio provides you the platform for that very purpose. We will provide you with: 
1 A zio app with full mentor access, 
2 Where you can create and advertise as many as courses needed, 
3 Enroll any registered zio users, 
4 Schedule your courses, 
5 Publish course resources, 
6 Assign tasks and quizzes, and more such features all in one place
